name: Arc'teryx Kyanite Hoody - Women's
description: Some pieces find their way into every adventure. The Kyanite hoody has a trim, close-to-the-body fit and articulated patterning that makes it a great base layer for super-cold climbs, a sleek mid-layer on cold, all-day outings and a standalone option for high-output activities like Nordic skiing or winter running. Made from stretchy, breathable Polartec®, with a light nylon face that adds some abrasion resistance and protection from the elements.Polartec® fleece is warm, breathable and moisture-wicking, with a nylon face for added durability.Four-way stretch, articulated patterning and gusseted underarms allow freedom of movement.Low-profile hood fits under a helmet.Full front zip has no-slip "speedbumps" to prevent accidental opening.Hem, cuffs and collar are bound with durable stretch elastic.Breathable mesh-lined handwarmer pockets.Internal laminated chest pocket.Straight hem.Trim fit for easy layering.
